messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 47 RONIN
messages.msgSnippet: I haven t heard of this publication.  Can you tell us more about it?  Is there an index to it? I would love to know if there are any articles on the Satsuma
messages.messageBody:
I haven't heard of this publication. Can you tell us more about it? Is
there an index to it?

I would love to know if there are any articles on the Satsuma Rebellion of
1877.

Bob Burke

In a message dated 8/26/03 7:23:47 AM, mickey.letham@... writes:

<< There are two very good articles in the latest issues of Monumenta

Nipponica, numbers 58.1 and 58.2. This is the start of a series of articles

commemorating the 300 anniversary of the event. >>

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 47 RONIN
messages.msgSnippet: There are two very good articles in the latest issues of Monumenta Nipponica, numbers 58.1 and 58.2. This is the start of a series of articles commemorating
messages.messageBody:
There are two very good articles in the latest issues of Monumenta
Nipponica, numbers 58.1 and 58.2. This is the start of a series of articles
commemorating the 300 anniversary of the event.

messages.subject: 47 RONIN
messages.msgSnippet: Can anyone reccommend a good source to read the original story of the 47 ronin ? Not the kabuki version. thanks, Matt [Non-text portions of this message have
messages.messageBody:
Can anyone reccommend a good source to read the original story of the 47
ronin ? Not the kabuki version.

thanks, Matt
